city_tier_system.description: Defines the capabilities, events, and unlocks associated with each city tier from Tier 1 (lowest) to Tier 10 (highest).

features: Completely vulnerable to demon beast waves
No soul walls or elemental rooms
Bronze/Yellow soul cultivators become more common
First major arena or public sparring events
Law Theory classes introduced in school
Elite-class cultivators begin returning to cities
Legendary gear available in elite stores
Soul Wall unlocked for all students
Higher-class bloodline families establish sect roots
City Lords can access regional decree systems
Named pillar clans participate in inter-realm conferences

system_interaction: School systems and class structure shift at Tier 6
Runemaster and enhancement gear logic activates at Tier 6+
City Lords gain access to decree tools starting Tier 9

city_tier_system.status: Fully defined across dev files. Ready for export and realm behavior expansion.
